A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
*SPOILERS* but I'll keep it vague.
Disappointed\, summs it up. It wasn't bad\, but the whole thing felt VERY preechy.
The whole Mary Poppins thing was an absolute joke. Like it ruined the whole movie for me personally. The whole casino planet segment was unnecessary and achieved nothing. Snoke being built up that much\, apparently insanely powerful only for that to happen?..
There were some good parts with the main characters\, but all the ancillary characters feel hollow and unnecessary; there's no depth to them.
Still very much preferred the force awakens! Felt rushed\, preechy and P.C.
